items.goldenFrameDesc: A prestigious golden border for your avatar
items.legendaryFrameDesc: The most exclusive frame for true champions
items.neonThemeDesc: Vibrant neon colors for your interface
items.darkModeProDesc: Enhanced dark theme with OLED blacks
items.extraDoubleChanceDesc: Get an additional Double Chance power
items.extraStreakShieldDesc: Protect your streak one more time
items.extraChaosCardDesc: Add more chaos to your games

wildCards.skipCardDesc: Skip one event without losing your streak
wildCards.stealCrownDesc: Challenge the crown holder to a head-to-head duel
wildCards.revengeCardDesc: Double points when competing against a specific player
wildCards.peekAnswersDesc: See poll majority before making your vote

rulebook.title: Rulebook
rulebook.disclaimer: This is a game between friends. Play fair, have fun!
rulebook.powersDescription: Special abilities you can earn and use
rulebook.noPowerHistory: No powers have been used yet
rulebook.tryAdjusting: Try adjusting your search or filter
rulebook.philosophySubtitle: These are the core principles that make Squad Game fair, fun, and meaningful.
rulebook.fairPlayDesc: All powers are designed to be balanced. No single power can dominate the game. Strategy and participation always win over luck.
rulebook.livingRulesDesc: This rulebook evolves with your squad. New powers may be added and balance adjustments made based on how squads play.
rulebook.squadDemocracyDesc: Major game-changing powers require squad approval. No one player can unilaterally alter the experience for everyone.
rulebook.quote: The best games are the ones where everyone wants to come back tomorrow.

coreRulesList.temporaryDesc: No power lasts forever. Every power has a clear duration and expiration.
coreRulesList.visibleDesc: There are no secret powers. When you activate a power, your squad sees it.
coreRulesList.earnedDesc: Show up consistently and you unlock powers. The game rewards engagement.
coreRulesList.absenceDesc: You cannot earn powers by sitting out. Inactivity erases your standing.
coreRulesList.influenceDesc: Powers that help you succeed outweigh powers that hurt others.

doubleChance.name: Double Chance
doubleChance.short: Get two attempts in the next event.
doubleChance.full: When activated, you receive two attempts at the next event instead of one. Only your best result is counted toward the final score. This power is perfect for high-stakes moments when you need insurance against a bad attempt.
doubleChance.duration: Single use - expires after one event
doubleChance.limits: One Double Chance per event per player
doubleChance.howToCancel: Cannot be cancelled once an event begins. Before event starts, tap the power badge to deactivate.
doubleChance.expirationRules: Expires 24 hours after being granted if not used. Also expires if no events occur within that window.
doubleChance.unlockCondition: Finish in bottom 3 of weekly leaderboard
activationConditions: Must be activated before an event starts
Cannot be used on already-completed events
Must have earned the power through participation

targetLock.name: Target Lock
targetLock.short: Mark one player as your target.
targetLock.full: Choose one player to lock on to. That player will see a visible indicator that they are being targeted. If you beat their score in the next event, you steal bonus XP from them. Creates psychological pressure and rivalry dynamics.
targetLock.limits: Can only target one player at a time. Once locked, cannot change target until event ends.
targetLock.howToCancel: Target can be changed before event starts. Once event begins, target is locked.
targetLock.expirationRules: Expires when the event ends. If you beat your target, you gain +50 bonus XP. If they beat you, they gain +25 XP.
activationConditions: Must select a target before the event starts
Target must be in the same squad
Cannot target yourself or the same person twice in a row

chaosCard.name: Chaos Card
chaosCard.full: Draw a random rule modifier that affects the next event for ALL players in your squad. Chaos cards can flip the game on its head - reversing scores, adding time pressure, or changing win conditions. High risk, high reward.
chaosCard.limits: Only one Chaos Card can be active per event. Squad vote required.
chaosCard.howToCancel: Can be challenged by 3+ squad members within 2 minutes of activation. If challenged, a vote occurs.
chaosCard.expirationRules: Effect ends when event concludes. Some chaos effects may persist into results phase.
chaosCard.unlockCondition: Hold the crown OR maintain 7+ day streak
activationConditions: Must be activated during event countdown (10 minutes before)
Requires confirmation from at least 2 squad members
Cannot be stacked with other Chaos Cards

streakShield.name: Streak Shield
streakShield.short: Protect your streak if you miss an event.
streakShield.full: Life happens. The Streak Shield automatically activates to save your participation streak if you miss an event. Your streak counter stays intact, but you receive no points for that event. Use wisely - shields are earned, not given.
streakShield.limits: Maximum one shield per week. Cannot stack multiple shields.
streakShield.howToCancel: Cannot be cancelled. Once triggered, it is consumed.
streakShield.expirationRules: Shield expires unused after 7 days. If not needed within that window, you lose it.
activationConditions: Automatically activates when you miss an event
Must have an active streak of 5+ days

judge.title: Judge
judge.description: The Judge has special powers during today's event. Their decisions can be challenged by the squad.

insurance.title: Participation Insurance
insurance.description: Your consistent participation qualifies you for minimum rewards even if you don't win.

comeback.title: Comeback Boost
comeback.description: You've been struggling lately. Earn {{multiplier}}x points for the next {{hours}} hours!

pressure.title: Leader Pressure
pressure.description: You're in the lead! Everyone's watching. Don't slip up!

eventPowers.powerWillApply: This power will apply to this event
eventPowers.tapToActivate: Tap to activate before event starts

pressureTap.title: PRESSURE TAP
pressureTap.subtitle: Tap as fast as you can for 10 seconds!
